title: this 3 part series of riven and yasuo is the best lore add on that riot has ever released
body: im an extremely avid reader and writer as well as a major perfectionist so normally even if i really like something i see i can say "but they could have done x better" or something, but this story was incredibly well written.  whoever wrote this story, major props to you, whatever riot is paying you its not enough

replies.body:

But yes, this is some great storytelling. And we plan to do plenty more.
